hackathon-description-text: Derbyhacks is the culmination of a lot of work and a lot of love for hacking. A weekend long invention competition designed to bring lots of people together for a great time of learning, laughing and building.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best hack for a smart city. Bonus points for incorporating open data.
Best integration of smart city and the home
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Home is Where the Hack is
Hack to the Heart (and You're Too Late)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Hack that demonstrates the most challenging and well-executed technical proficiency
Best appliance or home related projects, judged by FirstBuild staff members
Goes to the team that can best sell their project
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: American Showman (SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOOOOOOOT)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best social media post over the 36-hour period using the hashtag #makeyourcity

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Free passes to Louisville Startup Weekend (April 7-9) and Heine Brother's gift cards.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most potential value for the world / biggest market

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1960 Arthur St, Louisville, KY 40208, USA
hackathon-location-description: University of Louisville - Speed School Engineering Garage
